title: Monster
description: Alex has had one mission since she was destroy the man who destroyed her life. And all was going to plan until one night, a huge mammoth of a man breaks into her apartment and kidnaps her, holding her hostage for the very man she was bent on bringing down. Breaker has one he doesn't deal in women. But when he's conned into a job for the city's most ruthless crime lord, he finds himself in charge of a fiery-tempered hacker who he can't seem to keep his hands off of. When passions ignite and feelings emerge, will Breaker be able to reconcile his loyalties before it is too late or will their shaky foundation of trust start crumbling beneath their feet?
author: Jessica Gadziala
